rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
环境因素通过表观遗传修饰显着影响基因表达表观遗传学是对不涉及 DNA 序列改变的基因功能变化的研究，在理解遗传学与环境之间复杂的相互作用方面发挥着关键作用。综述文章“表观遗传学与环境健康”深入分析了表观遗传修饰如何影响各种疾病，特别是癌症和心血管疾病的发病和进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Environmental-factors-significantly-impact-gene-expressing-through-epigenic-modifications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Environmental-factors-significantly-impact-gene-express-through-epigenic-modifications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7cf81970-84ab-4c94-97a2-60e4aafb7716 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 00:18:03 -0400 Environmental factors significantly impact gene expression through epigenetic modifications
研究表明人类正在接近生命的生物学极限在 19 世纪和 20 世纪，由于更健康的饮食、医疗进步和许多其他生活质量的改善，我们看到预期寿命急剧增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Study-suggests- humans-are-approaching-a-biological-limit-to-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Study-suggests- humans-are-approaching-a-biological-limit-to-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61255774-ecb1-4371-8fc0-dc61d729f7ba Tue, 08 Oct 2024 00:07:47 -0400 Study suggests humans are approaching a biological limit to life
早睡可以通过增加有益细菌来促进儿童的肠道健康研究表明，与晚睡者相比，早睡的孩子拥有更多样化、更健康的肠道微生物群，这表明睡眠习惯与肠道健康之间存在联系。它还强调了早睡者和晚睡者之间不同的关键代谢途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Early-bedtime-boosts-childrens-gut-health-by-increasing-beneficial-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Early-bedtime-boosts-childrens-gut-health-by-increasing-beneficial-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ce775a3-1c76-4b14-95cc-b048d2936f79 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 00:00:00 -0400 Early bedtime boosts children's gut health by increasing beneficial bacteria
流行的痤疮和红斑痤疮产品中的苯含量超出预期研究人员已确定，目前市场上用于治疗痤疮和红斑痤疮的局部过氧化苯甲酰 (BPO) 治疗药物中的很大一部分不稳定，并且苯（一种已知的人类致癌物）含量高得令人无法接受。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Unexpected-苯-levels-in-popular-acne-and-rosacea-products.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Unexpected-苯-levels-in-popular-acne-and-rosacea-products.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e4ac745-0999-4ab4-bebf-d2b9bd14c639 Mon, 07 Oct 2024 23:59:05 -0400 Unexpected benzene levels in popular acne and rosacea products
克服 CRISPR 治疗应用的副作用CRISPR 是一种革命性的工具，使科学家能够精确修改任何生物体中细胞的基因组和基因表达。它是一种试剂——一种促进反应的物质——将酶与能够定位特定基因序列的可编程 RNA 结合在一起。一旦被引导到正确的位置，酶就会像一把剪刀一样，剪切、替换或删除 DNA 序列。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Overcoming-CRISPRs-side-effects-for-therapeutic-applications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Overcoming-CRISPRs-side-effects-for-therapeutic-applications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=758deb4e-c644-451a-9bc4-01424b72b49b Mon, 07 Oct 2024 23:45:08 -0400 Overcoming CRISPR's side effects for therapeutic applications
多西环素可增加肠道抗菌药物耐药性，且不会破坏微生物组多样性多西环素暴露后预防会增加肠道中的四环素耐药基因，但不会显着影响男男性行为者和跨性别女性的微生物组多样性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Doxycycline-increases-antimicrobial-resistance-in-the-gut-without-disrupting-microbiome-diversity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Doxycycline-increases-antimicrobial-resistance-in-the-gut-without-disrupting-microbiome-diversity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16c49799-94df-4537-b46d-5505ae48d79c Mon, 07 Oct 2024 23:27:00 -0400 Doxycycline increases antimicrobial resistance in the gut without disrupting microbiome diversity
GLP-1 药物通过改善神经血管功能和减少炎症来保护大脑健康研究强调了 GLP-1 受体激动剂如何通过靶向神经血管单元来改善大脑健康，将代谢健康与认知功能联系起来。它提出了治疗阿尔茨海默病等神经退行性疾病的潜在疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/GLP-1-drugs-protect-brain-health-by-improving-neuroangio-function-and-reducing-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/GLP-1-drugs-protect-brain-health-by-improving-neuroangio-function-and-reducing-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11109583-4d90-401e-bc68-5ced0c8085fd Mon, 07 Oct 2024 22:55:00 -0400 GLP-1 drugs protect brain health by improving neurovascular function and reducing inflammation
研究人员发现衰老细胞如何伤害和治愈肝病研究人员开发了新型遗传工具来追踪、消融和操纵 p16^Ink4a+^ 衰老细胞，揭示它们在肝纤维化和修复中的独特作用。衰老的巨噬细胞促进纤维化，而内皮细胞有助于组织恢复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Researchers-uncover-how-senescent-cells-can-both-harm-and-heal-in-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Researchers-uncover-how-senescent-cells-can-both-harm-and-heal-in-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=017a3e4b-ac3a-4486-b44c-0e68b2276dd7 Mon, 07 Oct 2024 22:40:00 -0400 Researchers uncover how senescent cells can both harm and heal in liver disease
低收入 Medicare Advantage 受益人在牙科、视力和听力护理方面面临障碍根据《健康事务》发表的一项新研究，与高收入受益人相比，拥有医疗保险优惠计划的低收入成年人更有可能难以支付牙科、视力和听力服务费用，尽管他们参加了涵盖这些福利的计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Low-venue-Medicare-Advantage-beneficiaries-face-barriers-to-dental-vision-and-hearing-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Low-venue-Medicare-Advantage-beneficiaries-face-barriers-to-dental-vision-and-hearing-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0f19121-d57a-48dd-8188-23813991a36c Mon, 07 Oct 2024 22:27:00 -0400 Low-income Medicare Advantage beneficiaries face barriers to dental, vision and hearing care
新平台模仿免疫相互作用以促进癌症治疗想象一个你自己的免疫细胞转变为抗癌超级英雄的世界。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/New-platform-mimics-immune-interactions-to-boost-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/New-platform-mimics-immune-interactions-to-boost-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c82d334-514e-4e58-93f4-198438e7b785 Mon, 07 Oct 2024 22:06:17 -0400 New platform mimics immune interactions to boost cancer treatment
